title: Send Formal Notice of Delay
description: Due to a permitting delay caused by the city, the PM must send a formal notice to the client to protect the company's contractual rights regarding the schedule.

tasks.description: Retrieve the prime contract to review the notification requirements for delays.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the contract requires written notice within 10 days of a delay event.

tasks.description: Draft a formal 'Notice of Delay' letter to the client, citing the specific cause (city permit) and its impact.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional, formal notice is drafted.

tasks.description: Send the notice to the client and log it in the project's correspondence log.
tasks.expected_outcome: The notice is sent and a record is kept.
